column4: I need some SERIOUS help with Ubuntu.  Right now it's taking over my computer.  I can ONLY boot from the CD, even if I unplug the drive that has Ubuntu on it, I can't access Windows OR Ubuntu without the CD.  I need my computer for school, as I'm homeschooled.  Whenever I restart my comptuer, it says something about loading GRUB and  then it gives <continued...

I need some SERIOUS help with Ubuntu. Right now it's taking over my computer. I can ONLY boot from the CD, even if I unplug the drive that has Ubuntu on it, I can't access Windows OR Ubuntu without the CD. I need my computer for school, as I'm homeschooled. Whenever I restart my comptuer, it says something about loading GRUB and then it gives me an error 15.  I need help.  I'm REALLY mad at...
how did you do the install?
take the computer to someone that knows what they are doing, and they may be able to fix it
that's worst case scenario, but if you keep going on it, you could make it worse
use the livecd to back stuff up like they've said
just take it to a computer professional
if you have the livecd then you have what you need to do a backup
you can access your windows stuff from that cd
so don't blame ubuntu. it only did what you told it
I know, but I did what everybody said in here to the letter.
